org.netbeans.modules.java.api.common.project

Interface ProjectOperations.Callback

  • Enclosing class:
    ProjectOperations

    public static interface ProjectOperations.Callback
    Callback for project operations. The callback is called before and after each project operation. The callback is registered by ProjectOperations.ProjectOperationsBuilder.setCallback(org.netbeans.modules.java.api.common.project.ProjectOperations.Callback) method.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ProjectOperations.Callback.Operation
      The type of project operation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void afterOperation(ProjectOperations.Callback.Operation operation, String newName, Pair<File,Project> oldProject)
      Called at the end of the project operation.
      void beforeOperation(ProjectOperations.Callback.Operation operation)
      Called at the beginning of the project operation.

    • Method Detail

      • beforeOperation

        void beforeOperation(@NonNull
                     ProjectOperations.Callback.Operation operation)
        Called at the beginning of the project operation.
        Parameters:
        operation - the operation being performed

      • afterOperation

        void afterOperation(@NonNull
                    ProjectOperations.Callback.Operation operation,
                    @NullAllowed
                    String newName,
                    @NullAllowed
                    Pair<File,Project> oldProject)
        Called at the end of the project operation.
        Parameters:
        operation - the operation being performed
        newName - the new project's name or null when not applicable, eg. delete
        oldProject - the old project or null when not applicable, eg. delete, move, rename
